info.name: cdrtools
info.description: Cdrtools is a set of command line programs that allows to record CD/DVD/BluRay media. The suite includes the following programs:   cdrecord  A CD/DVD/BD recording program   readcd    A program to read CD/DVD/BD media with CD-clone features   cdda2wav  The most evolved CD-audio extraction program with paranoia support   mkisofs   A program to create hybrid ISO9660/JOLIET/HFS filesystes             with optional Rock Ridge attributes   isodebug  A program to print mkisofs debug information from media   isodump   A program to dump ISO-9660 media   isoinfo   A program to analyse/verify ISO/9660/Joliet/Rock-Ridge Filesystems   isovfy    A program to verify the ISO-9660 structures   rscsi     A Remote SCSI enabling daemon
